meanings.definition: To sing or intone in a rhythmic, melodious manner.
meanings.sent1: The children chanted a happy song during the school play.
meanings.sent2: The monks chanted their prayers in the peaceful monastery.
meanings.sent3: The birds chanted a cheerful tune, making the forest come alive.
meanings.sent4: The waves chanted a soothing melody as they lapped against the shore.
meanings.sent5: The wind chanted through the trees, creating a calming atmosphere.

meanings.definition: A repeated rhythmic phrase or song.
meanings.sent1: The fans started a chant that echoed through the stadium.
meanings.sent2: The tribal chant filled the air with a sense of unity.
meanings.sent3: The catchy chant of the commercial stayed stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: The rhythmic chant of the train on the tracks was oddly comforting.
meanings.sent5: The ancient chant of the ceremony transported me to another time.
